dialog.text_response_2: Hi there, how's your day going? I just came back from a workout session and am feeling pretty tired.

dialog.text: I just had a really bad day at work, messed up a very important order and my boss got really angry at me.

dialog.text_response_1: That sounds awful! What happened? I hope you're able to relax or take a bubble bath tonight to unwind!
dialog.text_response_2: Jobs can be really, really hard. My job can be really hard sometimes, and I don't like it very much.

dialog.text: I thought an order was supposed to be delivered by next month when in reality it's supposed to be in two weeks.

dialog.text_response_1: Ouch! My job as a restaurant owner can be like that sometimes. Do you think you can get it done in time?
dialog.text_response_2: Many kinds of things can make orders take longer to arrive, and some orders can take longer than others.

dialog.text: Hopefully. Two weeks is not a lot of time but if I hurry I may still be able to get most it done.

dialog.text_response_1: Ok. Cool. I hope you have a good day. My day has been kind of so-so, nothing much to talk about or say at all.
dialog.text_response_2: Sounds good - I'm rooting for you! You'll feel like you just reached the top of Mt. Everest when this is all done.
